snippet: John Terry was acquitted of racially abusing an opposing player, Anton Ferdinand, in an unusual case that provided a vivid window into what happens on the field in British Premier League soccer games.
abstract: Chelsea soccer star John Terry is acquitted of racially abusing Queens Park Rangers opponent Anton Ferdinand, in an unusual case that provides a vivid window into what happens on the field in British Premier League soccer games.
lead_paragraph: John Terry was acquitted of racially abusing an opposing player, Anton Ferdinand, in an unusual case that provided a vivid window into what happens on the field in British Premier League soccer games.

headline.seo: Soccer Star Acquitted in British Trial Over Racial Slur
headline.main: Soccer Star Acquitted in British Trial Over Racial Slur
headline.print_headline: Chelsea’s Terry Is Acquitted of Racially Abusing Player
